doc:
Olive Brasno https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olive_Brasno 0 Olive Brasno (October 17, 1917 – January 25, 1998) was a dwarf dancer and actress who was known for her singing-and-dancing act with her brother George Brasno. She also appeared in a few films through the 1930s and 1940s. Born in Old Bridge Township, New Jersey, Olive Brasno and her brother George Brasno were first recognized as a brother-and-sister midget singing team in a partnership with Buster Shaver's vaudeville act. Olive_Brasno ( October_17_,_1917 – January_25_,_1998 ) was a_dwarf_dancer and actress who was_known for her_singing-and-dancing_act with her_brother_George_Brasno . She also appeared in a_few_films through the_1930s_and_1940s .
